About the Company: E-WHA Foam India Limited (EFIL) was incorprated as a Public Limited Company on 6th November, 1992 in Maharashtra. In 2012 Company has changed its name from E-Wha Foam India Ltd. to Blue Pearl Texspin Ltd. The Company now proposes to set up a unit at Sancoale Industrial Estate of Goa, Daman & Diu Industrial Development Corporation, Goa to produce 1500 tonnes polyethylene foam products. Polyethylene foam is characterised by a high degree of heat resistance, resilience and buoyancy. Besides packaging applications, ainly as cushioning material, it also finds application in industry segments viz., automobile, shoe uppers, sports goods, carpet lining, air-conditioning, refrigeration etc. Polyethylene foam is environmentally safe.
